class.name: UnivariateMultiStartOptimizerTest

method.name: testQuinticMin
method.comment: The quintic function has zeros at 0, +-0.5 and +-1.
The function has extrema (first derivative is zero) at 0.27195613 and 0.82221643,

method.name: testBadFunction
method.comment: Ensure that the exception was thrown because no optimum was found.
